summary: A storm has demolished The Bridge book store. Charlie and Donna will soon lose it from lack of funds but Charlie's accident leaves him in a coma. Meanwhile, Molly and Ryan can't forget the best time of their lives together at The Bridge.
cast: Katie Findlay|Wyatt Nash|Ted McGinley|Faith Ford|Steve Bacic|Andrea Brooks|Alison Araya|Devon Alexander|Natasha Burnett|Jaime M. Callica|Guy Christie|Anne Marie DeLuise|Robert Egger|Kazumi Evans|Carey Feehan|Matt Hamilton|Laura Jacobs|Nicole G. Leier|Mark McConchie|Alain Mickelson|Troy Mundle|David Allan Pearson|Isabela Reynolds|Chris Shields|Kirsten Van Ritzen|Denis Corbett|Yolanda Corbett|Christian J. Stewart
title: El puente 2
